trans-unit.source: Specifies a range of character positions within a string.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un intervallo di posizioni dei caratteri all'interno di una stringa.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> structure, specifying a range of character positions within a string.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> struttura, specificando un intervallo di posizioni dei caratteri all'interno di una stringa.

trans-unit.source: The position of the first character in the range.
trans-unit.target: La posizione del primo carattere nell'intervallo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if `First` is set to 0, the first position of the range is position 0 in the string.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se `First` è impostato su 0, la prima posizione dell'intervallo è posizione 0 nella stringa.

trans-unit.source: The number of positions in the range.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di posizioni nell'intervallo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this object is equivalent to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se questo oggetto è equivalente all'oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Equality%2A> to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Equality%2A>per verificare l'uguaglianza.</xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Equality%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to for equality.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da confrontare per verificarne l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the specified object is an instance with the same <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.First*> and <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Length*> value as this instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare l'oggetto specificato è un'istanza con lo stesso <> </> *> e <> </> *> valore di questa istanza; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position in the string of the first character of this <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la posizione nella stringa del primo carattere dell'oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The first position of this <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La prima posizione di questo <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Intero con segno a 32 bit che rappresenta il codice hash per questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of positions in this <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il numero di posizioni in <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of positions in this <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di posizioni in <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.First*> and <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Length*> values of the two <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <> </> *> e <> </> *> i valori dei due <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> oggetti sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: You can also test for equality using the <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile verificare l'uguaglianza utilizzando il <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Equals%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> da confrontare per verificarne l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> da confrontare per verificarne l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the two <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> objects have the same <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.First*> and <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Length*> values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare che i due <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> oggetti hanno lo stesso <> </> *> e <> </> *> valori; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.First*> or <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Length*> values of the two <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> objects are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <> </> *> o <> </> *> i valori dei due <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> oggetti non sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: The Inequality method returns the opposite of the <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Equality%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo di disuguaglianza restituisce l'opposto del <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Equality%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.op_Equality%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> to compare for inequality.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> da confrontare per verificarne la disuguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> to compare for inequality.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> da confrontare per verificarne la disuguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the either the <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.First*> or <xref:System.Drawing.CharacterRange.Length*> values of the two <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> objects differ; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare che il <> </> *> o <> </> *> i valori dei due <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> gli oggetti sono diversi; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
